entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHEAST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
